page.title: 07The Round House
page.content: The{Round House}is a 19th century listed building of unusual construct- ion situated in{Sennen Cove}just off the A30,3 miles from{Lands End.}The old capstan at one time used for hauling boats up the beach is on view and in the Net Chamber above there is a permanent display of some of the best craftwork and paintings produced in{Cornwall.} Among the more unusual crafts on sale are{Cornish}made kites,knot boards, crab pots and locally restored antiques as well as a wide range of pottery,jewellery,pewter,sweaters, macrame etc.On specified dates local craftsmen will be working in the{Round {House}as well as{Sennen}portrait artist{Bob Hunt. We have made a scale model of this interesting building at our school.
